enumDescriptions.ApplyUpdate: Apply an update using the specified component.
enumDescriptions.Wait: Wait for the WaitTimeSeconds number of seconds.

Component.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the unique identifier for the resource and it shall be of the form defined in the SPMF specification.

Created.description: ISO-time of task creation (by whomever created this thing)

Expire.description: ISO 8601 Redfish-style time string after which we will automatically change state to Expired - null for no expire time

Filename.description: The unique filename of the component.  This correlates to 'Filename' in the HpeComponent.

MaintenanceWindow.description: The maintenance window for this update task.

Modified.description: ISO-time of last task queue item update by updater (not client)

Name.description: User defined name of the task.

RecoveryPrivilege.description: This task was created by a user with Recovery Set privilege, and would allow a downgrade if 'DowngradePolicy' is set to 'RecoveryDowngrade'.  Applies if the command is 'ApplyUpdate'.  Ignored otherwise.

MessageArgs.description: The message arguments array is substituted for the arguments in the message when looked up in the message registry.

MessageId.description: The key for this message that can be used to look up the message in a message registry.

ResultLog.description: base64 encoded entry to capture component log.  Estimated to be generally 1-2KB. written by updater

StartAfter.description: ISO 8601 Redfish-style time string of earliest execution - null for no start time specified

State.description: The current state of the update task.

enumDescriptions.Canceled: The task is no longer scheduled to run.
enumDescriptions.Complete: The task was completed and the results are available in the Results.
enumDescriptions.Exception: The task was unsuccessful because of an exception condition.
enumDescriptions.Expired: The task will not execute because the current time is after the 'Expire' time.

TPMOverride.description: If true then the TPMOverrideFlag is passed in on the associated flash operations.

UpdatableBy.description: This is an unordered set of permitted updaters that can execute this item.

enumDescriptions.Bmc: This component may be scheduled for update by iLO.
enumDescriptions.RuntimeAgent: This component may be scheduled for update by a runtime update agent such as Smart Update Manager or Smart Update Tool.
enumDescriptions.Uefi: This component may be scheduled for update by UEFI BIOS.

UpdateRecoverySet.description: Update Recovery Set with this component if the command is 'ApplyUpdate'.  Ignored otherwise.

WaitTimeSeconds.description: The number of seconds to pause if the command is 'Wait'.  Ignored otherwise.

title: #HpeComponentUpdateTask.v1_0_2.HpeComponentUpdateTask
